sentence.Network_en: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentence.Network_cn: 他立刻离开，回到汽车旅馆。

sentence.Network_en: Everywhere building facades are pitted with shell and bullet holes.
sentence.Network_cn: 任一处的建筑物正面都布满了弹洞。

sentence.Network_en: Kevin was always level-headed with both feet on the ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 凯文总是头脑冷静，脚踏实地。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 择善固执的英文怎麽说... ... bitter end 顽固的；(苦尽的)。 bullet-headed 顽固的;愚蠢的；圆头(子弹头)的。 Dogged 顽固的,固执的。.

list.abs: I did not receive a bullet in my head for being a Christian ., 我从没有因为是一个基督徒而被枪指着脑袋.

RelatedPhrase.word: A bullet whistled past his head
